Ancient environmental DNA
The great majority of the genetic information underpinning these adaptive responses has been lost through evolutionary change. However, a rich record of those responses survives in the earth over many thousands and millions of years as ancient environmental DNA (eDNA) (DOI: 10.1126/science.1084114).
